body:
### About
Chemical engineer by education, Web engineer by trade.

### Articles
* [_Web Application Stat Collection with Node.js and Circonus_](http://circonus.com/blog/2013/01/Web-Application-Stat-Collection-with-Node.js-and-Circonus) (Jan 24, 2013 on [Circonus Blog](http://circonus.com/blog))
* [_Histograms: Monitoring Hot Spots_](http://omniti.com/seeds/histograms-monitoring-hot-spots) (July 11, 2012 on [OmniTI Seeds](http://omniti.com/seeds))

### Around the Web

* [Last.fm - @Tau_Zero](http://www.last.fm/user/Tau_Zero)
* [Flickr - @bbickerton](http://www.flickr.com/photos/bbic)
name: Brian Bickerton
